ThingDef.label: crashed ship part
ThingDef.description: A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain exotic materials, computers, even AI personas. This kind of technology can be dangerous.

ThingDef.label: crashed poison ship part
ThingDef.description: A mysterious crashed piece of a spaceship. It may contain exotic materials, computers, even AI personas. This one seems to be poisoning the ground around it.

ThingDef.label: ship chunk
ThingDef.description: A chunk of a spacecraft. Can be deconstructed to yield useful steel and components.
